text:
@realDonaldTrump @MariaBartiromo To rise like a Phoenix is what America is meant to be under the strong leadership of Pres Trump🇺🇸❤🇺🇸

From Covid19  to these current mayhem mostly from Democratic States,
America will survive & win again!

Sorry @BarackObama, @SpeakerPelosi,Dems& fake news media ..u lost again!
